patterns_detected: Bollinger Band upper-tag / near upper band
Short-term momentum slowdown after impulse (loss of follow-through near resistance)
ai_result.explanation: EURUSD on the 1H timeframe remains in a bullish trend (price above SMA20=1.18621 and SMA50=1.18253 with positive MACD=0.00325). However, current conditions are stretched: RSI(14)=82.76 signals overbought, and price (1.19133) is pressing into the key resistance zone (1.19237) and near the Bollinger Upper (1.19298). Recent highs show repeated probing into the 1.1922–1.1929 area with failure to extend, suggesting supply/mean-reversion risk. For a swing trader, the higher-probability play is a pullback/mean reversion toward the 20SMA (1.1862) and potentially the 50SMA (1.1825). The stop is placed above the upper band/resistance cluster to avoid getting wicked out by a final breakout attempt.
ai_result.timeframe_bias: Short-term bearish pullback/mean-reversion within a broader bullish trend; expect retracement risk while RSI cools.
advanced_patterns: Market structure: bullish impulse with potential short-term distribution at resistance (range-top selling)
Mean-reversion setup: deviation from SMA20 with upper Bollinger proximity
Potential bull-trap risk if price briefly breaks 1.19237/1.19298 and rejects
ai_result.volume_analysis: Volume data not provided; confirmation would be stronger if rejection at 1.19237-1.19298 occurs on rising volume followed by declining volume on bounces.
ai_result.momentum: Bullish trend momentum is still positive (MACD > 0), but upside momentum looks overheated and vulnerable to a corrective pullback given RSI extreme and resistance/upper-band compression.

lessons.title: Understanding Candlesticks
lessons.content: Learn the basics of candlestick charts including body, wicks, and what they represent about market sentiment.

lessons.title: Doji & Spinning Tops
lessons.content: Master doji patterns - standard doji, dragonfly, gravestone, and long-legged doji patterns for reversal signals.

lessons.title: Engulfing Patterns
lessons.content: Bullish and bearish engulfing patterns are powerful reversal signals. Learn to identify and trade them.

lessons.title: Identifying Trends
lessons.content: Learn to identify uptrends, downtrends, and sideways markets using higher highs, higher lows patterns.

lessons.title: Drawing Trendlines
lessons.content: Master the art of drawing accurate trendlines and channels for trend-following strategies.

lessons.title: Key Levels
lessons.content: Understanding support and resistance levels - how price reacts at key levels and how to trade bounces.

lessons.title: RSI Mastery
lessons.content: Relative Strength Index - overbought/oversold conditions, divergences, and hidden divergences.

lessons.title: MACD Deep Dive
lessons.content: MACD histogram, signal line crossovers, and divergence trading strategies.

lessons.title: Bollinger Bands Strategy
lessons.content: Bollinger Band squeezes, walks, and mean reversion strategies for volatility trading.

lessons.title: Position Sizing
lessons.content: Learn the 1-2% rule, risk-reward ratios, and how to calculate proper position sizes.

lessons.title: Emotions in Trading
lessons.content: Managing fear and greed, avoiding revenge trading, and building mental discipline.

lessons.title: Gartley Pattern
lessons.content: Learn the Gartley harmonic pattern with Fibonacci ratios for high-probability reversal trades.

lessons.title: Bat & Butterfly Patterns
lessons.content: Advanced harmonic patterns - Bat (0.886 retracement) and Butterfly (1.272 extension) setups.

lessons.title: Break of Structure
lessons.content: Smart money concepts - Break of Structure (BOS), Change of Character (CHoCH), and order blocks.
